text:
なぜ
そんなに
落ち込むの?
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 3.03%;top: 0.39%;width: 14.79%;height: 9.98%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 22.82%;top: 1.65%;width: 10.64%;height: 10.93%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
うん、でも
慣れない場所で寝ると
アイツ不安になるから
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 38.78%;top: -1.02%;width: 20.43%;height: 10.69%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 66.86%;top: -0.08%;width: 11.38%;height: 9.36%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
生まれた時から
友達だからさ
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 71.65%;top: 15.96%;width: 12.66%;height: 11.71%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
両親が知り合いで
ずっと一緒だった!
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 27.71%;top: 28.62%;width: 24.68%;height: 6.68%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 47.82%;top: 38.05%;width: 12.87%;height: 4.56%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;

text:
彼は
本当に
１番で
唯一の
親友…
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 82.39%;top: 49.45%;width: 15.11%;height: 13.29%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;

text:
悲しませたく
ないんだ!!
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 3.88%;top: 65.88%;width: 10.43%;height: 8.25%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
エイフェン
早く
降りて!
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 50.27%;top: 63.68%;width: 7.87%;height: 5.97%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;
